list.title: My Wines
list.subtitle: Manage your wine collection
list.emptyState: No wines yet. Start by adding your first bottle!
list.noResults: No wines match your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.

detail.emptyNotes: No tasting notes yet. Add your first tasting note!
detail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this wine? This will also delete all associated tasting notes.
detail.confirmDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete this tasting note?

add.title: Add Wine
add.subtitle: Add a new bottle to your cellar

placeholders.foodPairings: e.g., Grilled steak, aged cheese, roasted lamb...

descriptions.winery: Associate this wine with a winery
descriptions.drinkingWindow: When is this wine expected to be at its best?
descriptions.foodPairings: Recommended dishes and ingredients that pair well with this wine

validation.invalidVintage: Please enter a valid vintage year
validation.startBeforeEnd: Start year must be before end year
validation.endAfterStart: End year must be after start year

filters.title: Search & Filter
filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by wine or winery name...

form.notesPlaceholder: Describe the wine's aroma, taste, body, finish...

stockMovement.title: Stock History
stockMovement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this stock movement? This will adjust the wine quantity.

form.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Purchased from store, Consumed at dinner...
form.notesDescription: Optional details about this stock change

wineryCreated.title: Winery created
wineryCreated.message: A new winery was added to your collection

lowConfidence.title: Low confidence identification
lowConfidence.message: The AI was not highly confident in this identification. Please review the suggested data.

errors.title: Enrichment failed
errors.allFieldsFilled: All fields already have data. Nothing to enrich.
errors.noData: AI could not identify this wine. Try editing manually.
errors.noUpdates: No fields were updated. The AI could not provide additional information.

progress.title: Enriching Wines with AI
progress.pleaseWait: Please wait... This may take a few minutes.

partialFailure.title: Bulk enrichment completed with errors
partialFailure.message: {{count}} wines could not be enriched. Check individual wine details.

noChanges.title: No wines enriched
noChanges.message: All wines already have complete data or could not be identified by AI.

errors.title: Bulk enrichment failed
errors.message: An error occurred during bulk enrichment. Please try again.

wineAdded.title: Wine added
wineAdded.message: Wine has been added to your cellar

wineDeleted.title: Wine deleted
wineDeleted.message: Wine has been removed from your cellar

stockMovementAdded.title: Stock movement recorded
stockMovementAdded.message: Stock change has been recorded successfully

stockMovementUpdated.title: Stock movement updated
stockMovementUpdated.message: Stock change has been updated successfully

errors.cannotMergeSameWine: Cannot merge a wine with itself. Please select a different wine.

merge.title: Merge Wines
merge.description: Combine two wine entries with the same name and vintage. All tasting notes, stock movements, and locations will be transferred to the target wine. Quantities will be summed.
merge.targetPlaceholder: Select the wine to merge into
merge.warning: This action cannot be undone. All data will be moved to the target wine, quantities will be combined, and the source wine will be deleted.

overview.title: Cellar Overview
overview.unpositionedWinesDesc: These wines are in this cellar but don't have a specific shelf, row, or column assigned yet.
overview.emptyMessage: You haven't added any cellars yet. Add a cellar in the wine form to get started.
